# Looking at Bmore NEI data

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)

```


```{r}
Bmore_NEI_2017 <- read_excel("~/JHU/FA-20/Capstone/data/raw/Bmore_NEI_2017.xlsx")
View(Bmore_NEI_2017)

```

# selecting out wheelabrator and curtis bay incinerator sites

```{r}
wheel <- Bmore_NEI_2017 %>% dplyr::select("site name", "site latitude", "site longitude", 
                                          "unit type", "pollutant code", "pollutant desc",
                                          "pollutant type(s)", "total emissions", "emissions uom")


```
